EconomicPerformanceSum.name: EconomicPerformanceSum
EconomicPerformanceSum.description: Represents statistics about the direct economic value generated and distributed by an organization or the related income and expenses.

Country.description: Specifies the country for which the economic performance statistics are being reported.

Description.description: The description of the economic performance statistics.

DisclsReportingPeriodId.description: The reporting period for which the economic performance statistics are generated.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Market.description: Specifies the market for which the economic performance statistics are being reported.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PerformanceCategory.description: Specifies the category of economic performance.

PerformanceType.description: Specifies the type of economic performance.

Region.description: Specifies the region for which the economic performance statistics are being reported.

TotalAmount.description: The total economic performance amount according to a combination of performance category and performance type based on country, region, and market.

SubsidiaryAccountId.description: The account that's identified as a subsidiary company.
